title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: LOT 1: Lealana 1 LTC #6593 "LbfZUF5R" Buyer FundedLOT 2: Lealana 0.1BTC #5505 "1Q1NPktd" Buyer FundedLOT 3: 2x 2011 Casasius 1BTC redeemed, no hologramsLOT 4: 2012 Casascius 1BTC, DIY w/ attached address/key "1CChi1iK"LOT 5: 2012 Casascius 1BTC, redeemed "1CSgYdaf"*Lot 1 and Lot 2 full addresses are not currently known**Lot 3 will work on a LIFO system as seen in previous auctions*STARTING BID PER LOT PER COIN: 0.0010BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT PER COIN: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: APRIL 7st, 2023, 15:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: Ramelius
